title: How to lvl up on Boards?
body: I'm trying to post in the forum but it says I'm lvl 2 and only lvl 6 members are allowed to comment.

replies.body: Your boards level is tied to your client Summoner level! Sometimes this side of the equation needs a little nudge to get updated correctly, but it looks like making this post synced your accounts since I can see you as level 30 now.
